Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19635516]Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli ATCC 25726 (MIC=25 µM);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=50 µM);Yeast:Candida albicans ATCC 90028 (MIC=25 µM).
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: For this series of peptides, there were not enough material for antimicrobial assays. It displayed hemolytic activity (human red blood cells) at LC50=220 uM.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from the skin secretions of the New World frogs Lithobates capito and Lithobates warszewitschii (Ranidae).
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Meetani MA, Coquet L, Jouenne T, Leprince J, Vaudry H, Kolodziejek J, Nowotny N, King JD.
